summary: Arjun and Pyare Mohan are honest policemen who work together. Trouble follows when thieves Bade Miyan and Chote Miyan, look-alikes of Arjun and Pyare, commit crimes and the hapless duo are blamed for it.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Govinda|Raveena Tandon|Ramya Krishnan|Anupam Kher|Paresh Rawal|Satish Kaushik|Sharat Saxena|Madhuri Dixit|Rakesh Bedi|Sushma Seth|Divya Dutta|Asrani|Mahavir Shah|Avtar Gill|Javed Khan|Ghanshyam Rohera|Shehzad Khan|Razak Khan|Shashi Kiran|Kishore Anand Bhanushali|Jeetu Verma|Babbanlal Yadav|Manmauji|Yusuf Bawa|Gavin Packard|Jugnu|Jack Gaud|Shiva Rindani|Gulshan|Surendra Rahi|David Dhawan|Kader Khan|Viju Khote|Kedarnath Saigal|Tiku Talsania
title: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
